text: to aap logon ko isee dharm kee or bulaate rahen tatha jaise aapako aadesh diya gaya hai usapar sthit rahen aur unakee ichchhaon par na chalen tatha kah den ki main eemaan laaya un sabhee pustakon par, jo allaah ne utaaree[1] hain tatha moojhe aadesh diya gaya hai ki tumhaare beech nyaay karoon. allaah hamaara tatha tumhaara paalanahaar hai. hamaare lie hamaare karm hain tatha tumhaare lie tumhaare karm. hamaare aur tumhaare beech koee jhagada nahin. allaah hee hamen ekatr karega tatha usee kee or sab ko jaana hai
